meanings.definition: A service in which shoes are polished or cleaned.
meanings.sent1: I got a shoeshine at the mall yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The shoeshine made my shoes look brand new.
meanings.sent3: The shoeshine at the fair was so shiny, it blinded me!
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a shoeshine, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The shoeshine smelled like fresh lemons and made me smile.

meanings.definition: The act of polishing or cleaning shoes.
meanings.sent1: She did a quick shoeshine before heading out.
meanings.sent2: His shoeshine skills were unmatched in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to give itself a shoeshine with its tongue.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a shoeshine, bringing joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The shoeshine left a sparkle on the shoes that lasted for days.
